events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The customer issue has been categorized under Refund based on their request for money back due to sizing problems.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket that did not fit the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you would like to request a refund for your recent purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the jacket so we can process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 672839. I want a refund because the jacket feels too tight and uncomfortable.
Thank you for providing the details. We can process your refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and for helping me with the return shipping label.
We have emailed you the return shipping label. Please send back the jacket, and we will complete the refund promptly once received.
Just checking in to see if you were able to return the jacket and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
